title: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeWasteTrap
description: Pipe fitting, set adjacent to a sanitary terminal, that retains liquid to prevent the passage of foul air.

WasteTrapType.title: WasteTrapType
WasteTrapType.description: Identifies the predefined types of trap from which the type required may be set.

OutletConnectionSize.title: OutletConnectionSize
OutletConnectionSize.description: Size of the outlet connection from the object.

InletConnectionSize.title: InletConnectionSize
InletConnectionSize.description:
Size of the inlet connection(s), where used, of the inlet connections.

Note that all inlet connections are assumed to be the same size.
